verses.verse: Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H428>"These<s%> are the <S%H1697>things<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> [you] to <S%H6213>do.<s%>

"For <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> may be <S%H6213>done,<s%> but on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> [day,] a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of <S%H7677>complete<s%> <S%H7677>rest<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> any <S%H4399>work<s%> on it shall be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
"You shall not <S%H1197>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in <S%H3605>any<s%> of your <S%H4186>dwellings<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>"

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>'Take<s%> from among you a <S%H8641>contribution<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> is of a <S%H5081>willing<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> let him <S%H935>bring<s%> it as the Lord's <S%H8641>contribution:<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H5178>bronze,<s%>
and <S%H8504>blue,<s%> <S%H713>purple<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> [material,] <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> goats' [hair,]
and rams' <S%H5785>skins<s%> <S%H119>dyed<s%> <S%H119>red,<s%> and <S%H8476>porpoise<s%> <S%H5785>skins,<s%> and <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%>
and <S%H8081>oil<s%> for <S%H3974>lighting,<s%> and <S%H1314>spices<s%> for the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and for the <S%H5561>fragrant<s%> <S%H7004>incense,<s%>
and <S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> and <S%H4394>setting<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> for the <S%H646>ephod<s%> and for the <S%H2833>breastpiece.<s%>

'And let <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2450>skillful<s%> <S%H3820><s%> <S%H2450>man<s%> <S%H3820><s%> among you <S%H935>come,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has commanded: <S%H6680><s%>

the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> its <S%H168>tent<s%> and its <S%H4372>covering,<s%> its <S%H7165>hooks<s%> and its <S%H7175>boards,<s%> its <S%H1280>bars,<s%> its <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> and its <S%H134>sockets;<s%>
the <S%H727>ark<s%> and its <S%H905>poles,<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat,<s%> and the <S%H6532>curtain<s%> of the <S%H4539>screen;<s%>
the <S%H7979>table<s%> and its <S%H905>poles,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>utensils,<s%> and the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H6440>Presence;<s%>
the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> also for the <S%H3974>light<s%> and its <S%H3627>utensils<s%> and its <S%H5216>lamps<s%> and the <S%H8081>oil<s%> for the <S%H3974>light;<s%>

and the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7004>incense<s%> and its <S%H905>poles,<s%> and the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> and the <S%H5561>fragrant<s%> <S%H7004>incense,<s%> and the <S%H4539>screen<s%> for the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> at the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle;<s%>

the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> with its <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H4346>grating,<s%> its <S%H905>poles,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>utensils,<s%> the <S%H3595>basin<s%> and its <S%H3653>stand;<s%>
the <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> its <S%H5982>pillars<s%> and its <S%H134>sockets,<s%> and the <S%H4539>screen<s%> for the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2691>court;<s%>
the <S%H3489>pegs<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and the <S%H3489>pegs<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> and their <S%H4340>cords;<s%>

the <S%H8278>woven<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> for <S%H8334>ministering<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H899>garments<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> to <S%H3547>minister<s%> as <S%H3547>priests.<s%>' "
Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3318>departed<s%> from Moses' <S%H6440>presence.<s%>

And <S%H3605>everyone<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5375>stirred<s%> him and <S%H3605>everyone<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H5068>moved<s%> him <S%H935>came<s%> [and] <S%H935>brought<s%> the Lord's <S%H8641>contribution<s%> for the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> and for <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H5656>service<s%> and for the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments.<s%>

Then <S%H3605>all<s%> whose <S%H3820>hearts<s%> <S%H5081>moved<s%> them, both <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H802>women,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> [and] <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H2397>brooches<s%> and <S%H5141>earrings<s%> and <S%H2885>signet<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> and <S%H3558>bracelets,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3627>articles<s%> of <S%H2091>gold;<s%> so [did] <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5130>presented<s%> an <S%H8573>offering<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H4672>had<s%> in his <S%H854>possession<s%> <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> [material] and <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%> and goats' [hair] and rams' <S%H5785>skins<s%> <S%H119>dyed<s%> <S%H119>red<s%> and <S%H8476>porpoise<s%> <S%H5785>skins,<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> them.

<S%H3605>Everyone<s%> who could <S%H7311>make<s%> a <S%H8641>contribution<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> the Lord's <S%H8641>contribution;<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> man, <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H4672>had<s%> in his <S%H854>possession<s%> <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> for <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service,<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> it.

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2450>skilled<s%> <S%H3820><s%> <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H2901>spun<s%> with their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H4299>what<s%> they had <S%H4299>spun,<s%> [in] <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> [and] <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> [material] and [in] <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H8336>linen.<s%>
And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5375>stirred<s%> with a <S%H2451>skill<s%> <S%H2901>spun<s%> the goats' [hair.]

And the <S%H5387>rulers<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> and the <S%H68>stones<s%> for <S%H4394>setting<s%> for the <S%H646>ephod<s%> and for the <S%H2833>breastpiece;<s%>
and the <S%H1314>spice<s%> and the <S%H8081>oil<s%> for the <S%H3974>light<s%> and for the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> and for the <S%H5561>fragrant<s%> <S%H7004>incense.<s%>

The <S%H3478>Israelites,<s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H802>women,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5068>moved<s%> them to <S%H935>bring<s%> [material] for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4399>work,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to be <S%H6213>done,<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> a <S%H5071>freewill<s%> <S%H5071>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H7200>"See,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7121>called<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1212>Bezalel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H221>Uri,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2354>Hur,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

"And He has <S%H4390>filled<s%> him with the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> in <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> in <S%H8394>understanding<s%> and in <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4399>craftsmanship;<s%>
to <S%H2803>make<s%> <S%H4284>designs<s%> for <S%H6213>working<s%> in <S%H2091>gold<s%> and in <S%H3701>silver<s%> and in <S%H5178>bronze,<s%>

and in the <S%H2799>cutting<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%> for <S%H4390>settings,<s%> and in the <S%H2799>carving<s%> of <S%H6086>wood,<s%> so as to <S%H6213>perform<s%> in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4284>inventive<s%> <S%H4399>work.<s%>

"He also has <S%H5414>put<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H3384>teach,<s%> both he and <S%H171>Oholiab,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H294>Ahisamach,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan.<s%>

"He has <S%H4390>filled<s%> them with <S%H2451>skill<s%> <S%H3820><s%> to <S%H6213>perform<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> of an <S%H2796>engraver<s%> and of a <S%H2803>designer<s%> and of an <S%H7551>embroiderer,<s%> in <S%H8504>blue<s%> and in <S%H713>purple<s%> [and] in <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> [material,] and in <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and of a <S%H707>weaver,<s%> as <S%H6213>performers<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> and <S%H2803>makers<s%> of <S%H4284>designs.<s%>
